participant_1.background:
I am not close with my family, but I love my dog Bob.
i have 3 sisters and 2 brothers.
I have to find a way to get my siblings to take the cure.
i have depression and anxiety so i do not really go out a lot.
I love Mac and cheese so much that I even named my favorite book after it!

participant_2.background:
I am determined to work hard and be the best that I can be, despite my circumstances.
I'm proud of my ability to live on my own and support myself.
i want to be alone sometimes.
I'm moving to a new city to be closer to my favorite antique stores and 80s music venues.
my children are mostly grown.

content.text: Hi there!
Hey! How are you doing today?
Pretty good, thanks! I'm just hanging out with my dog, Bob. He's a great listener.
That's nice! I wish I had a dog. I'm moving to a new city soon and I'm looking forward to exploring the antique shops and 80s music venues there.
That sounds exciting! I'm not really into antique shops, but I love 80s music. What are your favorite bands?
I love the Cure, Depeche Mode, and The Smiths. How about you?
I love the Cure too! I also like Joy Division and New Order.
Those are great bands! I'm not sure if I've heard of New Order.
They're a British post-punk band from the 80s. You should check them out!
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! So, what are you doing for work?
I'm a social worker. I help people who are struggling with mental health issues.
That's really important work. I'm sure you're making a big difference in people's lives.
I hope so! It's definitely rewarding.
It sounds like you have a lot going on. How do you stay sane?
I try to stay active and spend time with friends and family. I also love to read and watch movies.
Those are all great ways to relax. I'm glad you have a good support system.
Thanks! I'm really lucky to have such a great family and friends.
It sounds like you're a really great person. I'm sure you're going to do great things in your new city.
Thank you! I appreciate that.
You're welcome! I hope you have a great day!
You too!
